txt.en: Edible mushrooms can be found at Ronglagam in Máttugard.\n\nYou should collect the edible mushrooms.
Place the edible mushrooms in a supply chest
A supply chest can be found at any dwarf outpost in Máttugard.\n\nYou should place the edible mushrooms in a supply chest.

The stone-claw burrows of Ronglagam surface in a deep corner of Máttugard. Amongst the burrows an edible mushroom grows. Harvesting these mushrooms would certainly provide some extra sustenance to those in Máttugard.
The stone-claw burrows of Ronglagam surface in a deep corner of Máttugard.
